description: Ministry of Water Supply & Drainage - Order to Approve the acquisition of the land in Ellawatta D/S/D Balangoda, Ratnapura District for the Construction of the water source & water tank of Balangoda water supply scheme. Order to Approve the acquisition of the land in Kurudeniya D/S/D Udunuwara, Kandy District on which the Welamboda Buster Pump House of Kandy South water supply project was constructed
